Juypter Notebook.author: Phala Network
Juypter Notebook.description: A Juypter Notebook MCP server deployed on Phala Cloud that allows your AI agents to execute code and interact with the notebook with your prompt.

Figma MCP.author: Phala Network
Figma MCP.description: Give Cursor, Windsurf, Cline, and other AI-powered coding tools access to your Figma files with this Model Context Protocol server.

Supabase DB.author: Phala Network
Supabase DB.description: You can use this server to connect your favorite AI tools (such as Cursor or Claude) directly with Supabase.

ElevenLabsMCP.author: Phala Network
ElevenLabsMCP.description: Use any MCP client to connect to ElevenLabs to generate realistic voices for your projects.
ElevenLabsMCP.serverUrl: https://<your application id on Phala Cloud>-8000.dstack-<your node name>.phala.network

ElevenLabsMCP.url: https://<your application id on Phala Cloud>-8000.dstack-<your node name>.phala.network/sse

DeMCP Defillama.author: DeMCP
DeMCP Defillama.description: A DeFiLlama MCP server deployed on Phala Cloud that enables AI agents to fetch real-time DeFi data, including protocol TVL (Total Value Locked), chain metrics, and token prices.

Context7 MCP.author: Phala Network
Context7 MCP.description: The Context7 MCP server deployed on Phala Cloud to help agent retrieves up-to-date documentation and code examples for any library.

NEAR Blockchain MCP.author: Phala Network
NEAR Blockchain MCP.description: This tool provides a way for LLMs and AI agents to securely access and interact with NEAR accounts and blockchain functionality.
NEAR Blockchain MCP.serverUrl: https://<your application id on Phala Cloud>-3000.dstack-<your node name>.phala.network

NEAR Blockchain MCP.url: https://<your application id on Phala Cloud>-3000.dstack-<your node name>.phala.network/sse

Nexy MCP.author: Nexy AI
Nexy MCP.description: It features modular integrations for token analytics and social sentiment analysis, making it ideal for developers and analysts seeking automation and insight.
